programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag tries to prove to Mom that she’s a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.desc: Jess helps Mimi to find her little frend Sammy Snail who's gone missing. They check all the places she's seen him before and work out that if they follow the silvery train it leads right to him.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When shark and pilot fish are separated it’s up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop’s friend Theo finally comes clean on why he’s always rushing off.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: World Dice Tour 3
programme.desc: A single dice roll sends our cast members on a wild ride around the globe. Prepare for jaw-dropping twists on the revamped game board and an epic scale that transforms every destination into a theme park!

programme.title: Second Shot at Love
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.title: The Killer's Shopping List
programme.desc: It tells the story of Ahn Dae-sung, a perceptive supermarket cashier with an impressive memory, and his girlfriend Do Ah-hee trying to fight against criminals by tracking their shopping lists.

programme.title: King of Karaoke: VS
programme.desc: “VS,” which stands for “Vocal” and “Showdown,” is a survival show where participants showcase their singing abilities and compete against each other through karaoke to win a grand prize of 100 million won.

programme.title: GBRB: reap what you sow
programme.desc: Actors Lee Kwang-soo, Kim Woo-bin, Doh Kyung-soo and Kim Ki-bang, who are best friends in real life, experiencing and enjoying rural life in a remote ‘FARM’ while taking part in organic harvesting.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes – from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: BRO&MARBLE in Dubai
programme.desc: Top celebrities come together to play a real-life “Blue Marble” game in Dubai with unexpected challenges! Who will survive in crisis and seize both friendship and money as the ultimate winning bro?

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea 2
programme.desc: <Fresh off the Sea> returns with Season 2! Lim Ji-yeon and Lee Jae-wook join the crew to hit Korea's coast and explore local delicacies unique to the area.

programme.title: Cheongdam International High School
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder and being offered a transfer to a prestigious school, Hyein keeps being bullied by Jenna. She manipulates the evidence to take her down but faces unpredictable consequences.

programme.title: The Killer's Shopping List
programme.desc: It tells the story of Ahn Dae-sung, a perceptive supermarket cashier with an impressive memory, and his girlfriend Do Ah-hee trying to fight against criminals by tracking their shopping lists.

programme.title: World Dice Tour 3
programme.desc: A single dice roll sends our cast members on a wild ride around the globe. Prepare for jaw-dropping twists on the revamped game board and an epic scale that transforms every destination into a theme park!

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: After a heart transplant saved Do-hyun's life, his father was convicted of murder and sentenced to death. To prove his innocence, Do-hyun becomes a lawyer and investigates the case.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: After a heart transplant saved Do-hyun's life, his father was convicted of murder and sentenced to death. To prove his innocence, Do-hyun becomes a lawyer and investigates the case.

programme.title: Chansung's Cooking
programme.desc: 2PM’s Chansung will explore different restaurants, taste popular menus and recreate them with his own recipes!

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim

programme.title: The Backpacker Chef 2
programme.desc: <The Backpacker Chef> is back! With more clients, more demanding environment and an upgraded backpack, how will Chef Paik take on challenges this time?

programme.title: Chansung's Cooking
programme.desc: 2PM’s Chansung will explore different restaurants, taste popular menus and recreate them with his own recipes!

programme.title: World of Street Woman Fighter
programme.desc: The <Street Woman Fighter> series make a triumphant return on a global stage! 6 dance crews from different countries set to compete in an upgraded match to win the title of International Champion!

programme.title: Sworn Brothers
programme.desc: Two step-brothers are on opposite sides of the law as triad and cop

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: In early 11th century China, the Song Dynasty is being invaded by armies of the rival state Western Xia. Yang, the last of a long line of Song generals, is killed and his widowed wife Mu leads other widows into battle to save their dynasty.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: Former gangster Doo-hyun, known as "Goblin", served time for his boss' murder to protect Young-min. Out of prison, Young-min kidnaps Doo-hyun's daughter, forcing him to seek vengeance and reclaim his "Goblin" persona.

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed 4
programme.desc: An underground fighter fights brutal matches to protect the widow of a man he unintentionally killed in the ring.

programme.title: Prison On Fire
programme.desc: Inside a Chinese prison two inmates form a friendship and face the difficulty of life on the inside.

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: The film depicts an unpredictable global cooperative investigation by South Korean, North Korean, and American detectives who have come together for their own purposes.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A memory-impaired man discovers he gains consciousness in a new body every 12 hours. To uncover the truth, he must piece together his real identity while evading attacks from pursuing agents and dangerous criminals alike.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2
programme.desc: A restaurateur teams up with a police officer and his ex-con brother to avenge the death of a friend's daughter

programme.title: The Bag Man
programme.desc: A criminal bides his time at a seedy motel, waiting for his boss after killing several men and making away with a mystery bag.

programme.title: Mukoku
programme.desc: Kengo was also accomplished in kendo, but he stopped participating in the martial art activity after an incident. Now, he spends his days drinking and working as a security guard at a station building. Based on novel "Mukoku" by Shu Fujisawa.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: A poverty-stricken family cunningly place themselves in the service of an obscenely wealthy household who have been unknowingly harboring a stranger in their basement for years.

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: Wilt Chamberlain is the only NBA player to have scored a remarkable 100 points in a game. Investigate what happened to his 100-point ball. Then, examine a controversial Kentucky Derby trophy that may have been falsely identified.

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: A young Muhammad Ali clinched Olympic gold in 1960, but returned home to the same bigotry he’d left behind. Disillusioned, it’s said that he threw his medal into the Ohio River. Head to Kentucky and uncover the real story behind this legendary tale.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali, the greatest fighter ever, remains a global icon. His name still commands respect. Hear from those who knew him, relive his legendary fights, and explore the life of boxing’s greatest symbol.

programme.title: The Rock: Moving Mountains
programme.desc: Whether it’s the money or the muscles, you don’t mess with The Rock! Wrestling star turned Hollywood megastar carved himself a path to becoming king of the entertainment industry and brings his one of a kind charisma, charm and signature smile to everything he touches.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao: Unstoppable Force
programme.desc: This is the remarkable journey of one of boxing’s most unstoppable forces. Manny Pacquiao’s legacy will forever be remembered for the change accomplished inside and outside the ring…

programme.title: Sports Detectives
programme.desc: Wilt Chamberlain is the only NBA player to have scored a remarkable 100 points in a game. Investigate what happened to his 100-point ball. Then, examine a controversial Kentucky Derby trophy that may have been falsely identified.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest

programme.title: The Spy In The Hanoi Hilton
programme.desc: We bring together the highest-ranking POWs from the infamous “Hanoi Hilton” prison camp to reveal harrowing tales of torture, interrogation and brutal treatment. In the midst of this hellish existence, a handful of POWs created a clandestine movement that eventually led to major rescue attempts and a spy ring whose top secret connections can only now be revealed.

programme.title: Battle Of Midway: The True Story
programme.desc: An inside look at the Battle of Midway, the aircraft used on both sides of the fight, and the dramatic story of one fighter pilot and his pivotal role in America’s first true victory of the Pacific War.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: In space, there are few second chances. When something goes wrong, it's up to astronauts and Mission Control to come up with a solution together...and quickly.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: NASA vigorously trains its astronauts to ensure they are physically fit, mentally strong, and as reliable as the strongest machines. But the fact is, even the brightest of people make mistakes...and in the unforgiving environment of space, any error, even a small one, can have life and death implications.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: Flying through bad weather can be a harrowing experience, and for NASA, it can be doubly unnerving, as violent storms can strike from below the atmosphere or above it. Witness the true power of nature in space and on Earth as astronauts and ground crews battle to overcome the elements.

programme.title: The Story Of Playstation
programme.desc: With video-games on the rise, Sony, the tech superpower would attempt a collaboration with Nintendo. After a shocking betrayal, Sony founded what would become the world’s most successful chain of video game consoles. The Playstation was here to stay.

programme.title: The Story Of Nintendo
programme.desc: From humble beginnings manufacturing 'Hanufuda' cards came one of the world's most recognised videogame companies and presenting itself as a platform for quality games and strong values. This is the story of Nintendo.

programme.title: Gameplay: The Story Of The Videogame Revolution
programme.desc: Gameplay is a feature on the history of videogames. From Pong to Pac Man, Super Mario to Lara Croft, Doom, Grand Theft Auto and beyond, we chronicle the remarkable story of the fastest evolving new media of all time.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawston’s 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she can’t perform at Pawston’s 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesn’t break her promise to the town.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag tries to prove to Mom that she’s a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. All she has to do is get them to the playground, but the pups keep running off. \ When a giant, bone-shaped, roller coaster ride goes missing from the Amusement Bark, Detectives Tag and Scooch take on the case of the slobbery robbery.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: Abigail puts herself at risk to reunite an orphaned otter with his family. But the school veterinarian insists the animal will be safer at the zoo.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal

programme.desc: Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: KBS World Daily English News Anchor : Choi Kyu-yeon

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then…

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time
programme.desc: Ik Hyeon is a corrupt customs officer involved in drug dealings and hooks up with mob boss Hyeong Bae to sell drugs. Together they expand the mob business with their own connections and strengths, but when the government declares a war on crime, the two partners get entangled in a web of conspiracy and betrayal.

programme.title: Iron Ball

Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Monkey Twins

programme.title: Of All The Things
programme.desc: Already falling for each other, Berns starts maneuvering things to help Umboy retake the bar exams as he battles his fears to reclaim his self-esteem.

programme.title: General Emilio Aguinaldo
programme.desc: General Emilio Aguinaldo is a three-hour epic chronicling his political rise, his rivalries and his struggle against the Spanish and American colonizers. It aims to present a comprehensive narration of his life, achievements and even some controversial issues about him.

programme.title: Baler
programme.desc: Baler is primarily a love story between Feliza, the daughter of a rebel commander (Anne Curtis), and Celso, a half-Spanish soldier (Jericho Rosales), set at the twilight years of the Spanish regime in the Philippines.

programme.title: Ang Panday
programme.desc: A young blacksmith realizes his destiny when a malevolent demon bent on ruling the world unleashes an army of creatures on humanity.

programme.title: Bilib Ako Sa'yo
programme.desc: After losing his job for nearly losing a cargo of gold bars to hold-uppers, Gatdula finds himself working as a bouncer in a night club. There, he meets and is smitten by Varga.

programme.title: Ex With Benefits
programme.desc: A story of former lovers, Adam Castrances (Derek Ramsay) and Arkisha Aragon (Coleen Garcia). Adam and Arki went to school together and had a promising relationship until Arki suddenly left Adam without a word. Will they be able to heal the pain from the past?

programme.title: Walang Kapalit
programme.desc: A marriage gone sour with the husband leaving the wife, taking along a minor daughter and lying to her about her mother. Meanwhile, each carries a relationship with other parties. Deciding to forego their annulment case, they commit to give their marriage a second try.

programme.title: Dibdiban Ang Laban
programme.desc: After earning her college degree, Marian (Anjanette Abayari) returns to her small, far-flung hometown to become a teacher for the poor. But one day, Marian is captured by rebels as a way to get back at her oppressive father.

programme.title: On Vodka, Beers and Regrets
programme.desc: A washed up actress and former child star Jane Pineda (Bela Padilla), battles with love, chances and alcoholism as her career plummets to rock bottom.

programme.title: My Father, Myself
programme.desc: A lawyer is left to care for a massacre survivor, who happens to be the son of his former client. His wife and daughter welcome the boy as part of the family. But as the kids get older, the daughter confesses her love for the boy.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: Hating Kapatid is a movie that teaches us how siblings should stick together in times of happiness and problems.

programme.title: Sumigaw Ka Hanggang Gusto Mo
programme.desc: Five murdered students, One terrified survivor, One mysterious killer on the loose.

programme.title: Kasangga... Kahit Kelan
programme.desc: For years, Bardo and Julie have been casting dark shadows over many streets--he as a hustler, and she as a thief. One day, they are yanked out from their world of petty crimes and find themselves being groomed as deep penetration agents.

programme.title: Cheers S4 E13 - Take My Shirt…Please
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 E03 - Angels Go Truckin'
programme.desc: A series of challenging cases take the angels around the world to fight crimes, on behalf of their enigmatic millionaire boss, Charlie.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E03 - Tomorrow Is Not Another Day
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 E03 - Business, Italian Style
programme.desc: Samantha’s coronation as Queen of the Witches launches the Stephens family into another year of supernatural antics as they learn to cope with their young daughter’s developing magical powers.

programme.title: ALF S2 E07 - Oh Pretty Woman
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E04 - Hot Ticket
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S4 E08 - East Winds
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: North And South Book I E07 - Episode 4 (Part 1)
programme.desc: 1842. Two West Point military academy cadets form a bond of friendship strong enough to survive the forces leading to the United States' Civil War--forces that will rip their country into North and South

programme.title: Cheers S4 E14 - Suspicion
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 E04 - Avenging Angel
programme.desc: A series of challenging cases take the angels around the world to fight crimes, on behalf of their enigmatic millionaire boss, Charlie.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E04 - Abdullah
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 E04 - Double, Double… Toil And Trouble
programme.desc: Samantha’s coronation as Queen of the Witches launches the Stephens family into another year of supernatural antics as they learn to cope with their young daughter’s developing magical powers.

programme.title: CSI S4 E18 - Bad to the Bone
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: Mountain Men (S11)
programme.desc: In Idaho, Kidd and Harry Youren hunt a bear that tore up their camp, but the chase leads them into a confrontation. In Alaska, Martha and Elli Tansy try to bring down a bull moose.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Tom packs a traditional muzzleloader on a winter deer hunt with Sean and Hank. Jake and Anika complete a successful elk hunt. Aron and Jen cut down dead trees that threaten to destroy their cabin.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: Confidence grows when irrefutable scientific evidence reports the Fellowship is closer than ever to the gold.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Troy runs into big trouble in his favourite honey hole. Daniel chases a legendary gator known as The Pirate. Leron and Porkchop battle a voodoo curse and confront a zombie gator.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: After discovering new evidence of massive metallic objects buried beneath the Mesa, the team conducts an experiment at the Triangle that leads to one of the most shocking revelations on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: The changing landscape presents unique challenges and new opportunities for the participants, as they try to maintain their weight.

programme.title: Habang May Buhay
programme.desc: Pia found herself in the same predicament as her mother did years ago. During that time, Zeny gave up her true love to marry a man whom her parents preferred. This time around Pia was engaged to Jonathan although she was in love with Gary.

programme.title: Pita, Terror Ng Kalookan
programme.desc: Pita witnessed the murder of his favorite brother and vowed to take revenge. He did, and was jailed for his vendetta.

programme.title: Parañaque Bank Robbery
programme.desc: There was a robbery in the bank where Joselito Joseco was employed and having adapted the guts and bravery of his idol, he was able to save the loot and shoot down the robbers.

programme.title: I Love You 3X A Day
programme.desc: An English teacher's students always play tricks on him because of his carabao English. He meets and falls in love with a fellow teacher.

programme.title: Markadong Hudas
programme.desc: Daniel Braganza,a leading hatchetman of a crime syndicate.He was a killer totally bereft of conscience that he earned the nickname "Markadong Hudas".

programme.title: Pablik Enemi 1 N 2: Aksidental Heroes
programme.desc: Redford White and Dennis Padilla team in this fast paced wacky adventure as two bumbling idiots on the run after accidentally picking up a suitcase full of smuggled goods.

programme.title: Boy Buluran: Head Hunter Ng Maynila
programme.desc: Ronnie Ricketts, played the title role in the true story of Sgt. Boy Buluran, whose clever way with disguises and massive information network brought down a syndicate of bank robbers.

programme.title: Laging Naroon Ka
programme.desc: Opposites attract. And so they say. When the saintly, introverted Quinito meets the candid, out-going Trixie, there are no sparks flying to great heavens. In fact, both think that there’s just no way they can ever click.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Ipagpatawad Mo
programme.desc: They were the ideal couple and seemed to lead the perfect life. But their son was not like the other normal children. How they came to terms with the presence of their autistic child in their lives, is the gist of this wonderfully crafted film.

programme.title: Kamagong (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Arnis, the ancient Filipino martial art, took center stage in this coming of age drama wherein a young boy perfected his skills and his idol rediscovered what it takes to be a man.

programme.title: Kasalanan Bang Sambahin Ka
programme.desc: As a last fling before getting married, Alex (Julio Diaz) dates his friend's cousin Catherine (Vivian Velez). When Alex still marries his fiancee Grace (Dawn Zulueta), Catherine makes life difficult by creating a scandal.

programme.title: Somewhere (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A popular singer who was also the daughter of a judge was kidnapped by a convict he once sentenced to jail. But the act of revenge reversed itself when Lorna fell in love with her kind and caring captor.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.desc: Dig deeper into current affairs. Cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Lekh Raj Juneja, from India, leads Japan's largest manufacturer of rice snacks. In a Japanophiles interview, he talks about the international potential of Japan's rice processing craftsmanship.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Pungent, aromatic rakkyo is grown in Tottori, a major production area famous for sand dunes. See how farmers battled with a harsh environment to eventually produce a quality, versatile veggie.

programme.desc: In Shizuoka, we meet a six-generation mikan tangerine farming family, with four generations still active. During harvest, the family and friends work together, then enjoy a delicious outdoor lunch.

programme.desc: Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of.Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Humdinger, Sid, and Sweetie have joined forces to try and take over the Lookout. Humdinger sabotages Yumi's Bee costume sending her buzzing out of control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Humdinger's kitties make off with Mayor Goodway's book delivery truck. Julius and Julia get into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: William and Chucks compete for a prize. Chucks gives everyfishy a new nickname.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Every barbababy is invited to show their greatest talent on stage. Video games are fun, but you also need to know how to enjoy the nice weather!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work. Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew work together to transform Builder Cove's beach boardwalk into a bright, festive winter wonderland.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew use their construction skills to convert the super car wash and clean Farmer Zoe's sticky farm animals.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: After the Pokey Pigeons eat all of Abuela's elotes, Dora and Boots set out to find more ingredients for the Great Abuela Cook-off.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Super Wheels to the rescue! When the Bubblemaker starts trapping everything in his trouble bubbles, Blaze and Sparkle have to become superheroes to save Axle City!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 6
programme.desc: Cash flies over a locker that reveals a high-ticket mystery item. Then, everyone digs deep to win an ATM, but when the dust settles will this thing be filled with big bucks or major regret? And later, the unlikeliest of duos team up with a strategy that leaves our buyers' heads spinning.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 9
programme.desc: Let freedom ring, as World's Dumbest presents "Only in America." Featuring 20 of the most patriotic patriots in the land - from a cop's strange take on the national anthem, to a dangerous mishap with a bald eagle, and the most insane thank you to thetroops ever put on film. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of America's best comics, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 08
programme.desc: Our hosts find hacks for retrieving lost objects, separating egg yolks, and removing wallpaper stains. They'll also make duct tape an All-Star, find another use for walnuts, and show you how to hack your home while you're away.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 9
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr head to the Lone Star State in a special episode that proves even embarrassment is bigger in Texas. The city boys from New York whip up trouble teaching cowboy skills on a ranch, and forget their southern hospitality trying to sell western wear. And it's a real drag for tonight's loser at what is definitely his first rodeo.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.desc: In Vegas, an old rivalry resurfaces. Then, a locker reveals a covered item that's thought to be a vintage car, but when the bidding ends will the buyer drive away with a fortune or stall out in failure? And later, it's every man for himself when a unit full of gemstones ignites an all out war among the competition.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 8
programme.desc: A mega-find leaves the winning bidder scratching his head, but when the true nature of this item is revealed he'll be swimming in more than just cash. Then, the gloves come off when T-Money scrambles to scoop up a locker filled with vintage bar equipment. And later, Scott spots something he hopes no one else sees. If his secret stays safe, he could quadruple his profit.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 10
programme.desc: The guys give a taste of their awkward customer service at a liquor store, take tickets of humiliation at a deli counter, and try to get signatures to recognize phony holidays. And tonight's losers pay a frigid price in a coldhearted double punishment.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 117
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on this morning, turn to Meredith Sheehan for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 117
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Be My Guest
programme.desc: Adam's guests, chef Massimo Mele and athlete Isis Holt, lend a hand for Easy Entertaining, where the message is simple: be my guest!

programme.title: How Deadly World - Five Impressively Dangerous Wild Land Animals
programme.desc: Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones, explains the sometimes terrifying and often hilarious behaviour of deadly wild animals from around the world.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals - Episode 3
programme.desc: The benefits to being social can far outweigh any desire for peace and quiet - exploring the importance of shared knowledge and group dynamics, these seemingly anti-social animals all benefit from having 'mates'

programme.title: How Deadly - The Truth About Magpies In Australia
programme.desc: The magpie - the bird that divides Australia. For some, they're a dive-bombing nightmare and others, sweet backyard singers. Nature nerd Ann Jones breaks down these majestic creatures: there's more than meets the eye.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Bay of Fires, Fremantle, Healesville
programme.desc: Rae sets out on foot to traverse Tasmania's Bay of Fires, Ernie catches up with the founder of Freo's famed cappuccino strip and Narelda meets a Sapphire empowering Aboriginal youth.

programme.title: This Place - Bulgandry Aboriginal Art Site, Kariong
programme.desc: Gomeroi man, Gavi Duncan talks about Bulgandry. An art site at Kariong on the New South Wales Central Coast. Situated in the Brisbane Water National Park, it is home to centuries-old carvings depicting the story of Baiyami.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 19
programme.desc: High-stakes diplomacy as Donald Trump prepares to face up to world leaders at the G7 Summit in Canada, with tariffs and global trade high on the agenda. Plus the countdown to Trump's birthday and a possible military parade.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 99
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 99
programme.desc: Lorna Dunkley brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Be My Guest
programme.desc: Adam's guests, chef Massimo Mele and athlete Isis Holt, lend a hand for Easy Entertaining, where the message is simple: be my guest!

programme.title: This Place - Birian Balunah: Birthing of the Rivers
programme.desc: From Jambreen (Tamborine Mountain), you can see the valleys of the Gumeru (Coomera) and the Caningera (Canungra) rivers. Yugambeh storyteller, Paula Nihot tells the story of the Queen and her daughters who created this place.

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals - Episode 3
programme.desc: The benefits to being social can far outweigh any desire for peace and quiet - exploring the importance of shared knowledge and group dynamics, these seemingly anti-social animals all benefit from having 'mates'

programme.title: If You're Listening - RFK Jr v Fluoride
programme.desc: US Health Secretary RFK Jr is on a mission to ban the use of fluoride in water - and he's succeeded in Utah and Florida. So where did this anti-fluoride scepticism come from? And can it be stopped?

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 14 - St Kilda v Western Bulldogs
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: The World - Episode 92
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: How Deadly - Bats
programme.desc: Forget the stereotypes. There is more to bats then disease and demons. Dr Ann Jones unpacks why these 'flying farmers' might be Australia's most misunderstood animal.

programme.title: How Deadly World - Five Impressively Dangerous Wild Land Animals
programme.desc: Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones, explains the sometimes terrifying and often hilarious behaviour of deadly wild animals from around the world.

programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 80
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and businesses big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo - Bay of Fires, Fremantle, Healesville
programme.desc: Rae sets out on foot to traverse Tasmania's Bay of Fires, Ernie catches up with the founder of Freo's famed cappuccino strip and Narelda meets a Sapphire empowering Aboriginal youth.

programme.title: This Place: A View From The Shore - Mungurru the Rock Python and Waalumbal Birri
programme.desc: Long before being named the Endeavour River by Captain Cook, that body of water was referred to as Waalumbal Birri. This is the story of that life-giving water, and the clan boundaries it defines.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 118
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. James Glenday and Emma Rebellato bring you the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, Catherine Murphy with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 118
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on this morning, turn to Meredith Sheehan for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: The Italian Job (2003)
programme.desc: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: A tired American ex-boxer returns to his native hamlet in Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. He is confronted by strict local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this lively film has beautiful scenery, brilliant repartee, and local charm.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

programme.title: Under Fire
programme.desc: Three journalists in a romantic triangle are involved in political intrigue during the last days of the corrupt Somoza regime in Nicaragua before it falls to a popular revolution in 1979.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: A Little goes a long way as Stuart and Snowbell set out across New York City to rescue a friend in danger.

programme.title: The Battle Of Britain
programme.desc: In the greatest air battle of WWII, Harry Andrews, Michael Caine and Sir Laurence Olivier take to the skies to fend off the German invasion of England.

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: A millionaire widower and her teenage daughter take a five-star cruise together, but a grisly discovery is made when crew members find the widower's body crammed into her suitcase.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A Florida woman hides in her bathroom when a strange man breaks into her home in the middle of the night. A man trapped in his overturned truck calls 911 in a panic as the vehicle fills with icy water.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Reselling scrap junk became very hard as the market for scrap metal pays much less and so Andy had talked his mother into getting a reverse mortgage on the property.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Evidence leads detectives in Mobile to believe that a victim was murdered by two gunmen. But the trial leaves the jury wrestling with the question of whether one of the suspects could be found not guilty.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When a Tulsa man is killed by a bullet to the head, detectives discover guns hidden in the garage next door. The neighbor's role becomes a question in a case of cousin against cousin.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. An accused shoplifter launches an expletive-filled freak-out during his virtual bond hearing; a defendant gets tased after trying to escape; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A melee erupts as the gallery exits a murder trial hearing; a woman wanted on drug charges gets caught lying to the judge; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a customer attacks fast food workers over her slushy order; a judge has no mercy for a corrupt sheriff; a suspended driver shows up for virtual court.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: An emotional courtroom hears the sentencing of a man convicted of killing his brother-in-law; a man charged with drug possession claims to be an undercover government agent.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Detectives interrogate a woman accused of killing a lottery winner for his $30,000,000 prize; special agents press an ex-con about a missing 5-year-old girl and her dead babysitter; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A 92-year-old woman tells investigators why she shot and killed her 72-year-old son; a detective tells a suspect that the man he’s accused of stabbing has died at the hospital; and more.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S2)
programme.desc: After playing a demonic role, Malaysian actress Lavin Seow has a run-in with the supernatural; an uncle has to trap unfriendly spirits into a bottle before his niece would wake up from her coma.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S2)
programme.desc: Nine wandering spirits haunt a Singaporean family as they move into a new house; Karla Pambid from Philippines has a special gift - an ability to communicate with the unseen.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: Recently retired newlyweds embark on a tropical cruise. The happy and fun-loving couple are enjoying the adventure and romance of this new chapter when tragedy strikes and they are found dead.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: The family of a missing Texas mother becomes concerned when they start receiving suspicious text messages from her phone.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Shawna Forde was convicted for a 2009 crime that resulted in the violent murders of Raul Flores and his 9-year-old daughter Brisenia. She was sentenced to death.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A Florida woman fights for her life when her estranged husband starts shooting at her. A young mother finds herself in a terrifying situation when her brakes stop working.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A violent assault ends in a fatal stabbing when a young mother kills her boyfriend to defend her child. Considered innocent by police for four years, she was re-arrested and faces up to 41 years in prison.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A young father and his family come under attack at a busy drive-thru. Terrified of his aggravated assailant, he fires his gun and allegedly injures an innocent bystander.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: In Birmingham, a man's body is found burned; in New Orleans, a man with cancer gets a ride home that ends in his murder; and in Tulsa, a man visiting his son is killed in a jealous rage.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: People in charming Hope Mills, are on edge when a high school freshman vanishes while on her way to meet a friend. When she turns up dead three weeks later, the community rallies to flush out the killer.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-aaralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagbibigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent fractions. These also explain lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. These also talk about identifying the elements, comparing, and contrasting information from stories and how to write it. The videos also teach about words, phrases, and setences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pag- unawa at pagpapahalaga sa pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the motion of objects, sources and uses of light, sound, heat and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pang-uri, pang-abay, pang-angkop, at mga sanggunian. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagsusuri ng kuwento at pagbuo ng mga tanong.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain about percent, polygons, circles, and solid figures. These also teach about sequence and solving simple equations, time, and circumference.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about different text-types and how to summarize it. These episodes also discuss about making a stand and how to provide evidence to support opinion or fact.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa mga pagbabago sa lipunan ng sinaunang Pilipino kabilang ang pagpupunyagi ng ilang pangkat na mapanatili ang kalayaan sa Kolonyalismong Espanyol at ang impluwensya nito sa kasalukuyang panahon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about motion in terms of distance and time. These also talk about how different objects interact with light and sound, heat; the effects of heat and electricity, light and sound on people and objects. These also focus on simple DC circuit and the relationship between electricity and magnetism in electromagnets.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang suprasegmental, pagbubuod, pagsusuri at paghahambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan. Tintalakay din dito ang tungkol sa paggamit ng angkop na pahayag at panandang anaporik at kataporik na pangngalan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts of geometry of shapes and sizes, and geometric relationships.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about using multi-media resources and oral language when giving information. These also teach about expressing one's belief, citing evidence, and raining thoughts in public forums.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbabago, pag- unlad at pagpapatuloy sa Timog at Kanlurang Asya sa Transisyonal at Makabagong Panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about motion in one dimension, waves as a carrier of energy, and the characteristics of light. These also discuss how heat is transferred and the different charging processes.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan tulad ng parabula, elehiya, at alamat. Tinatalakay din dito ang pinagmulan ng mga salita at pag-uugnay ng sariling karanasan sa mga tekstong binasa.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the key concepts of parallelograms and triangle similarity.

programme.title: Grade 9 English

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan

programme.title: Grade 9 Science

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 1
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: Taddy Taddy Po ep 11
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. In this modern family, love wins. Alex is an up-and-coming reporter in a relationship with Marcus, a chef. One day, Alex's sister's kids show up at the couple's doorstep and the couple has no choice but to take care of the kids.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 13
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 28
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.
